-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://github.com/pgadmin-org/pgadmin4/issues/new/choose if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.administrador
(
    idadministrador serial NOT NULL,
    nombredeusuario character varying(100) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    password character varying(128) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    correoelectronico character varying(200) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    idencargadodearea integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT administrador_pkey PRIMARY KEY (idadministrador)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.autor
(
    idautor serial NOT NULL,
    nombredelautor character varying(200) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    fechadenacimiento date NOT NULL,
    carreradeegreso character varying(100) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    correoelectronico character varying(200) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT autor_pkey PRIMARY KEY (idautor)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.encargadodearea
(
    idencargadodearea serial NOT NULL,
    nombredeusuario character varying(100) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    password character varying(128) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    correoelectronico character varying(200) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    idtesis integer,
    CONSTRAINT encargadodearea_pkey PRIMARY KEY (idencargadodearea)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.filtro
(
    idfiltro serial NOT NULL,
    nombredelfiltro character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT filtro_pkey PRIMARY KEY (idfiltro)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.tesis
(
    idtesis serial NOT NULL,
    nombredelatesis character varying(200) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    releasedate date NOT NULL,
    archivopdf bytea NOT NULL,
    idautor integer,
    asesor character varying(200) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    idfiltro integer,
    visitas integer,
    CONSTRAINT tesis_pkey PRIMARY KEY (idtesis)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.administrador
    ADD CONSTRAINT administrador_encargadodearea FOREIGN KEY (idencargadodearea)
    REFERENCES public.encargadodearea (idencargadodearea) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.encargadodearea
    ADD CONSTRAINT encargadodearea_tesis FOREIGN KEY (idtesis)
    REFERENCES public.tesis (idtesis) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.tesis
    ADD CONSTRAINT tesis_autor FOREIGN KEY (idautor)
    REFERENCES public.autor (idautor) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.tesis
    ADD CONSTRAINT tesis_filtro FOREIGN KEY (idfiltro)
    REFERENCES public.filtro (idfiltro) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION;

END;
